page.title: 10Yetholm Parish Church
page.content: The Minister also serves Morebattle, Hownam and Linton, living in Kirk Yetholm. Sunday worship is at 10am attended by about seventy five adults a mixed choir of young and old. The congregation includes Episcopalians and occasionally supported by a Roman Catholic. The Yetholm roll numbers 250. Holy Communion is celebrated six times a year. On Easter , Christmas, Remembrance and Harvest Thanksgiving Sundays numbers will rise to two hundred. Most children will be baptised and most young people will become communicant members at about eighteen years. With few exeptions marriages are solemnised in church and funerals are invariably conducted by the minister at church or home with prayers at graveside or Edinburgh Crematorium. There is no evidence of a decline in the Cristian presence.
